local creature = EffectSource() if creature ~= nil then local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddCardName( creature:GetCardName()) filter:NotTargetted()
local total = filter:Count() - 1
